title: Sri Lanka: Cyclone Ditwah kills over 600
description: The cyclone caused landslides and floods that have killed hundreds of people, with hundreds more still missing. Sri Lanka is trying to secure IMF assistance to deal with the aftermath of the disaster.
content:
Landslide warnings were still being issued in Sri Lanka in the wake of last week's Cyclone Ditwah, with the death toll from the floods jumping to 607.
Some 214 people remained missing, the Disaster … [+2730 chars]

en: Sri Lanka: Cyclone Ditwah kills over 600. The cyclone caused landslides and floods that have killed hundreds of people, with hundreds more still missing. Sri Lanka is trying to secure IMF assistance to deal with the aftermath of the disaster.
la: Sri Lanka: Cyclone Ditwah super 600 necat. Cyclone proruit et diluvia quae centena hominum occiderunt, cum centenis adhuc desunt. Sri Lanka auxilium IMF secure agere cum clade reparata est.

title: ‘It’s really sad’: B.C. community still reeling 1 year after fatal landslide in Lions Bay
